title: Pixie Dust
description: From USA Today bestselling author, Laura Lee, comes a sexy, thrilling, and utterly addictive urban fantasy romance series. I, Karli Lane, am the last of my kind...Well, the last remaining fairy on Earth anyway.The rest of the Fae all returned to our homeland, when vampires nearly drove us to extinction. From the time I was only four years old, I've been forced to live in a world full of exposed supernaturals and keep my true identity hidden. Now, twenty years later, I'm facing one of the most significant events of a Fae's life-- without really understanding what it means.To further complicate matters, I witnessed a gruesome murder, landing a ruggedly handsome warlock and a sinfully sexy vampire on my doorstep and into my life. Both are obsessed with uncovering my secret; both could be guilty of stealing my heart. Protecting my heart is the least of my worries as I struggle to figure out who I am, how to control my powers, and, most importantly... how to stay alive.PIXIE DUST is the first installment of the Pixie Dust Chronicles. This is an urban fantasy romance series with a love triangle between a fae, a warlock, and a vampire. Each book must be read in order.
author: Laura    Lee
